headline: NVO vs. LLY: Which Obesity Powerhouse is the Stronger Bet Now?
summary: Eli Lilly edges ahead of Novo Nordisk as the stronger obesity bet, backed by robust sales growth, pipeline depth and strategic momentum.

headline: Amgen Looks to Take Share of Booming Obesity Space: Will It Succeed?
summary: Amgen aims to challenge obesity drug leaders with MariTide, a potential monthly treatment now in late-stage trials.

headline: AbbVie Adds More Than $24B in 6 Months: How to Play ABBV Stock
summary: ABBV adds $24B in market cap as Skyrizi and Rinvoq drive growth post-Humira, with more upside from a strong pipeline.

raw.headline: AbbVie Adds More Than $24B in 6 Months: How to Play ABBV Stock

headline: BMO downgrades Verve Therapeutics saying Lilly buyout deal caps upside
summary: Investing.com -- BMO Capital Markets downgraded Verve Therapeutics to Market perform, saying Eli Lilly’s agreement to buy the gene-editing specialist leaves limited room for the stock to rise before the transaction is expected to close in the third quarter of 2025.

raw.headline: BMO downgrades Verve Therapeutics saying Lilly buyout deal caps upside
